system.description: Each round you may target one living creature with waves of evil power. Effects by target HD: 10+ — sickened; 5–9 — panicked (1d4 rounds), sickened; 4 or less — comatose (10 min./level), panicked, sickened. Sickened: -2 on attacks, damage, saves, skills, ability checks for 10 min./level (remove curse effective). Panicked then shaken 10 min./level; becomes panicked again if it sees you. Comatose: catatonic, cannot be awakened short of dispel. Duration 1 round per 3 caster levels; move action each round after the first to target.
